tool_description: Effortlessly convert between volume and weight units for recipe ingredients. Our API is designed with a special focus on the precision and accuracy of weight measurements, making it the perfect solution for bakers. What sets us apart is that we meticulously divide flour into different types, such as bread flour, cake flour, all-purpose flour, almond flour, etc., and even list the flour of major brands like Bob's Red Mill, Gold Medal, King Arthur, and more. This attention to detail ensures tha...
name: Food Ingredient Measurement Conversion
title: Food Ingredient Measurement Conversion

api_list.name: Convert Ingredient
api_list.description:
1. Convert between Weight and Volume, 
     e.g., 1 cup of flour is 120 gram, or  1 ounce of butter is 2 tablespoon

2. Convert in the same category, e.g., 1 cup = 16 tablespoon = 48 teaspoon;  1 ounce = 28.35 gram; or 0°C = 32°F, 100°C = 212°F; or

optional_parameters.name: numDigit
optional_parameters.description: The number of digits of result. If not provided, default 2.

api_list.name: List all the Unit (Weight, Volume, Temperature)
api_list.description:
1. Convert between Weight and Volume, 
     e.g., 1 cup of flour is 120 gram, or  1 ounce of butter is 2 tablespoon

2. Convert in the same catagory, e.g., 1 cup = 16 tablespoon = 48 teaspoon;  1 ounce = 28.35 gram; or 0°C = 32°F, 100°C = 212°F; or
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://food-ingredient-measurement-conversion.p.rapidapi.com/list-units"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "food-ingredient-measurement-conversion.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
